text: Harry Fielder (26 April 1940 â€“ 6 February 2021) was an English actor. He was known for appearing in many television shows from the 1960s to the 1990s. His best known roles were on Doctor Who, Blake's 7, Shoestring, The Sweeney, Minder and The Professionals. Fielder died on 6 February 2021 at the age of 80.Announcement: In Memoriam Harry Fielder ==References== Category:1940 births Category:2021 deaths Category:English movie actors Category:English stage actors Category:English television actors Category:Actors from London
